pages.text: "A not so simple way to return to the Overworld."$(br2)While traveling around the world of the End, you can come across ancient ruins.
There is a destroyed (or not) frame of  $(bold)Runed Flavolite$() and six pedestals around it.
這些是曾經連接終界和主世界的宏偉傳送門的遺跡。$(br2)想要激活傳送門，您需要恢復框架（如果它是毀壞的）。
並將6個$(bold)永恆水晶$()放在基座上。
放置最後一個水晶後，傳送門將被激活。
$(bold)Runed Flavolite$() (to recover the frame) and $(bold)Eternal Crystals$() can be obtained by $(l:rituals/infusion_ritual)Infusion Rilual$(/l).
